name: Sharon WEBER, Appellant, v. Carolyn L. WEBER and Robert Weber

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
parties: Sharon WEBER, Appellant, v. Carolyn L. WEBER and Robert Weber.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Eileen D. Yacknin, Neighborhood Legal Services Ass’n, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Louis Yaira, Pittsburgh, for Carolyn L. Weber and Robert Weber.
Georgene Siroky, Child Advocacy Legal Aid Society, Pittsburgh, for Jennifer Weber.
casebody.head_matter:
538 A.2d 494
Sharon WEBER, Appellant, v. Carolyn L. WEBER and Robert Weber.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 8, 1988.
Decided March 21, 1988.
Eileen D. Yacknin, Neighborhood Legal Services Ass’n, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Louis Yaira, Pittsburgh, for Carolyn L. Weber and Robert Weber.
Georgene Siroky, Child Advocacy Legal Aid Society, Pittsburgh, for Jennifer Weber.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
